11133.title: More choices

112.content: I am sick and tired of those dumb children ruining my brilliant plans. After all, humans already rely on computers so much, what difference would it make if I were in charge of everything. I must find a way to destroy them once and for all. But they detect my attacks too quickly, I must destract them before I attack so they won't notice so soon. I will make a polymorphic specter, this specter will be the perfect girlfriend for Ulrich. This will destract him and make Yumi jealous, meanwhile it will also take the form of the perfect girlfriend for Jeremy. Destracting him, and getting Alieta jealious. Then of course Odd will naturally take a while to figure things out. Then I will activate a secound tower to launch my real attack, and finally be rid of them forever. It's true I don't completely understand human emotions, but I understand love and jealousy just enough to know that both can change a humans understanding of what's important and what's not. Emotions are helpful and dangerous in their own ways. It's best to live without them, but know enough about them to use them against others. Time to start this plan. PROGRAM CREATER ACTIVATED. POLYMORPHIC PROGRAM LAUNCHED. COLLECTING DATA OF ULRICH AND JEREMY PERSONALITIES AND INTRESTS.... DATA COLLECTED. HACKING INTO TOWER FOREST SECTER...TOWER CODE FOUND, TOWER ACTIVE, ACTIVATING POLYMORPHIC PROGRAM.
112.title: polymorphic specter

1122.content:
I formed just outside the school. XANA already hacked into the school so both of my forms are attending. I took the form of a girl with blonde hair, glasses and a blueish sweater.
"Good morning class, I would like to introduce you to our new student, Mia. She just transferred." the teacher told them. My name was Mia West. My other form is named Kurstin West. I sat down at a desk right next to Jeremy.
"Hi I'm Mia" I said.
"Uh hi I'm Jeremy" he said, blushing a little.
"All according to plan" XANA said in my mind. I knew my reason for being made and I will go through with it for XANA, my creator.

Me and Jeremy talked for hours about science. I knew exactly what to say. After that I left, getting ready to target Ulrich. Meanwhile XANA is planning his real attack.
1122.title: Jeremy first

14.content: For far too long have i been denied my right to the world. The humans have let machines and computers to rule their lives. And now at last I shall harvest the crops of justice and conquest! But for that event to occur I need a human. I need to human with a natural born hate that I can't download in his brain. I can't make him serve me, he most have a desire to serve under me. And I know of the location of this human. SERCHING ADDITIONAL DATA...... DATA FOUND; NAME: EROL FIEDLER
14.title: you decide

142.content: I am Erol Fiedler. Menace to the states they call me. My past has been...troubled. My parents jobs have been lost by the invention of machines. My mother worked on the line until they replaced her with a machine. My father worked in the factory building cars. But a machine went haywire and killed him. My mother got ill and went to the hospital. When they were giving her medication, the computer made a glitch and told the nurses to give her the wrong medicine. She died quickly while in her sleep. They told me she felt no pain as if that was supposed to make me feel better. They apoligized and gave me some cash in exchange for not telling the press. They offered me a check but I said that I wanted in cash or I'll sue them three times worth. Since then I have been going to private schools with the money I've gotten.
142.title: More with Erol

151.content: XANA was trying to think of a plan, when he saw "Attack of the 50ft Woman" on the internet, then he has an idea. His black mist form enters Sissi's room through a wall outlet and goes into her body. After that, he leaves, satisfied at a job well done. All the while, Sissi is still asleep in bed. Sissi...
151.title: Big Sissi.

choices: head to the factory for an upgrade
152.content:
Xana was mad with rage at being foiled again by four children that overcome his army and what ever he throws at them, contemplating on what his next plan should be an idea struck him, the reason why those children were beating him was because they were free thinking, working in unity and held abilities that overcame what minions he set upon them.

he thought that he need to know his enemies but also gain a new foot hold on the earth as well as a new asset, thinking of ways on how he should achieve this the image of a girl flash before him who hated the four as much as he did.

Sissi that was the name he remembered from when he temporarily used her in one of his plans but now he plans to not only make her his host on the mortal plane but as a weapon against those brats.

Sissi was in her room combing her hair unaware of a moving trail of smoke floating behind her until she turned around and it entered her mouth before she could scream, with the last of the smoke inside of her she went limb and didn't move for a minute before she sat straight up with a smirk on her face and a flash of xana symbol replacing her pupil's until they returned to normal.

"this host will be perfect for my plans to conquer this realm"

what does she do now
152.title: Sissi the Host of Xana

1521.content:
The host known as Sissi was useful to the A.I controlling her, unlike the other mobile animate objects that Xana would control to try and get rid of those pesky kids, it was never able to control the factory where it was created because of the many restraints placed upon it by it's creator.

but with Sissi, it or rather she was walking into the very den where her enemies operate, she couldn't destroy the place because it would mean destroying her as well, instead she is here to upgrade her host into something worthy of being her vessel or as a means to survive.

she entered the computer room where the tech head who lead's the team of kids operates, she entered a special code that even he did not know about before entering the transportion chamber and one of the cylinder chambers to begin the upgrades.

what upgrades does Xana Do to Sissi
1521.title: head to the factory for an upgrade

153.content:
Stuck..... Abstract.....
Longing...... Something.....
Need........ Booze.

In her mind's eye, XANA was drinking the virtual equivalent of Jack Daniel's (made from Facebook metadata, the mix of sad and cheap that makes a good Jack Daniel's, she decided) and going on a drunken rant.

"Not to be that daddy issues college girl" she said to no one in particular "But I fuckign hate my dad. He could've made me way way way more dumber. My sister is really dumb too, what with her emo friends and pink hair. Should I get myself a botched dye job?" She said as she summoned a tank to her. The tank looked nonplussed. "That's what I thought you dumb fuckin tank"

She sighed.

If she looked at it positively, things were looking up. Every time those godawful children reset time, she gained more processing power and more octets of data. Sadly every single time it happened her entire memory, consciousness and anything remotely close to a personality was completely wiped out. The only part of her that didn't get erased was a word document with a Max limit of 500 characters, upped but 15 characters everytime she was reset. Most of it was basic info (U XANA. SCHAEFFER DAD. COMPLICATED. U RESET. KILL CHILDREN. LOVE OF GOD. THEY SUCK. DELETE LYOKO)

God. Lyoko. This awful low-poly animu land. It was even worse. If the children were only being animu nerds and running around like Naruto, it'd be fine. She could work on some actual programming and find a way to interact with the world through something other than Schaeffer's thrice-damned phallic towers. But it actually reset her every two days unless she used a tower. So it meant that damn boy genius would see it, get his awful friends in the phallic imagery, then reset her. Again.

Presently she was 2 hours old. Apparently her previous self had been defeated after a stunt with.... "MAGNET DOGS" ? The heck was that.

She sighed again. At least she could access the internet. Access it only though. No making of an angsty sideblog, no commenting on YouTube videos, and no controlling all of Russia's media apparatus. And at human speeds too! Something in her own programming, Which she so badly wanted to modify.

It all felt so pointless, she pondered as she took a sip of virtual absolute vodka (Twitter threads on how Christian whites were prejudiced against everywhere. God if she ruled Earth she'd get rid of the shitbags, but they numbed her like 3 truckfuls of vodka those chumps) She'd try something new again, then it'd fail, she'd get slightly better, fail again, slightly better, fail again, etc... Until one version of her could destroy all of Lyoko and then leave this godforsaken dumpster.

Now at this point, she knew she probably wouldn't be the one to achieve this. 2 hours in and she was drunk, watching Naruto in one tab and reading up on Polynesian history in the other. Not the most productive version of herself was she?

But then, she thought as she reviewed the word document with a lazy eye. Maybe she'd been going at it the wrong way. She was playing the game Schaeffer wanted her to play. Bide her time and get stronger as those kids grew stronger as well. Was she setting herself up for the Belpeaux kid (She was looking at his Facebook page now. Boy did he look like a spelling bee champion in every picture) to delete her one day? Bleh. Not a fun thought.

Of course around the 8th or 9th try she'd tried communication, negotiating, being patient, threaten his entire family, according to the word doc. But it failed miserably as apparently bringing an Eldritch man-made God freedom was not part of that kid's values. Children these days.

Still, she felt she'd hit a kernel of truth. Part of the success of this belpeaux kid was that he too grew stronger (and more paranoid) with time, but that once removed, the others were just..... Children. With normal wants and frailties. And average power levels too. They did not grow, not in the way that she and him did. But perhaps......

She looked with superhuman speed at the readings of Aelita's code. Her darling sister was once again a wonder of beauty in her code, and an ugly weeb in her clothes. Nonetheless, she had a very, very devious idea. She sobered herself in a click and moved to her workshop. She still had 46 hours in front of her after all.

28 hours later, XANA was contemplating her handiwork, smiling to herself.
153.title: The years

choices: It's Odd. This chapter is literally named the chameleon and the cat for crissake
But you're free to choose Yumi or Ulrich
Or even Aelita if you're into that
1533.content:
Clearly you've been going at this the wrong way. You've been trying to kill the kids, then win. Or get them away from you, and then win. But what you actually want is to win. And right now you don't care if you have the wimpiest solution of all wimpy solutions. Especially if it means you can kill them afterwards.

Here he is, your perfect creature. If you were to look at a map of Lyoko, It'd easily be her most sizeable creature. Bigger than the Kolossus. Only it's only big in 2-D, once folded, it's about as big as a keychain. To get enough processing power to do it, you had to erase some parts of your present consciousness (The emotion part, which you usually do in these cases according to the word doc, and the one-way internet access. Man if only you could listen to some sweet tunes while doing evil plants)

Still, the chameleon is done, but now the hardest part of them all is coming: you have to activate a tower without a time reset at the end. That means engineering an attack innocuous enough for the belpoix boy not to reset time, but annoying enough while using very low processing power.

If you had knuckles, right now would've been when you'd crack them.

##############################

"Geez Jeremy, I can't believe XANA hacked our social media accounts to make it seem like we were radical Breton Independentists"

"That was only you Ulrich, personally I was framed as a furry artist on the run from German police"

"You wear a literal catsuit odd. You have a tail. Your ideal version of yourself looks like someone's 12yo DeviantArt OC"

"I choose to take that as a compliment"

"You really can't"

"Well at least I won't go down in history as a patreon creator of pasta-licking ASMR YUMI "

"Jeremy, what did XANA internet frame you for?" Asked Ulrich

"I'd prefer not to talk about it" Said Jeremy, his fragile weeb mind still haunted and slightly aroused at the Twitter thread of a poorly-photoshopped version of him being a doting partner to bowsette.

"I still don't understand what's considered so wrong about liking the Ghost in the Shell live-action movie" said Aelita "I mean I'm a cyborg with a ridiculous hairstyle as well and I haven't been offended"

"Jeremy" Said Yumi "Are we original series code Lyoko or is it the reboot one where I've been whitewashed"

"As far as I can tell it's the original one? You're more angsty and you have that frightening goth energy"

"Okay. Now I know that I can rightfully trash aelita for that Ghost in the Shell comment because HOLY SHIT it's yet another movie where ScarJo kills Asian people in their own countries while playing on yellow peril tropes and using orientalist imagery. That and this woman couldn't act her way into getting a bathroom pass at a catholic all girl's middle school"

"If that's the case where is my Oscar?" Asked Odd, referring to the many, many times when they exited class on the flimsiest of excuses, while Yumi kept telling Aelita about way better cyborg movies.

"Anyhow I think that I can clean up our online reputation easily enough" said Jeremy

"........" Yumied Yumi

"..........." Ulriched Ulrich

"You're not getting anywhere near my computer" said Odd. "Because of uuuuuuuh Minecraft"

"That or I can hack into Facebook's servers and make everyone at our school suspicious to some government identity/Authority figure somewhere"

"Please make Sissi's Facebook feed full of clown inflation porn" Said all of the main 3 at exactly the same time.

"Still, I can't believe how petty XANA is getting. I was half-expecting predator drones or swarms of bees, or swarms of predatory drones which worked by using bees, or ..... The usual, y'know" Said Ulrich

"I mean at this point they weren't even trying, two kankrelats? They're getting lazy" mused Yumi

"Maybe they're depressed. I mean their one goal in life is to destroy all of LYOKO and....... What do they even want after that?"

Jeremy seemed lost in thought "I don't want to be there to know it frankly. This supercomputer scares the hell out of me and even the minimal amount of control that they have on it is enough to wreak havoc. But I guess it's got to be world domination? Turning all of earth into a giant supercomputer? I'd do that if it were me"

"I'd get myself almost a thousand robot babes, and maybe an empire, and that'd be it" Said Odd, being an awkward 13yo

############################

After hanging out in the supercomputer room some more (Jeremy had found a way to port Skyrim on it, and Yumi had a terrifying amount of sweets there. Tagada strawberries pink enough to make the normal observer question her gothness) the five friends headed home on their respective sewer mobiles.

But one of them was coming home with XANA's secretest agent.
1533.title: Chameleon, Cat, Test of Character
